'''Open Sesame!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the [[World Quest]] ''[[The Foolish Fatuus]]''.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*The phrase "{{w|open sesame}}" comes from ''{{w|Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves}}'', a story in a collection of Middle Eastern folk tales known as ''{{w|One Thousand and One Nights}}''. In it, the titular Ali Baba discovers that the Forty Thieves keep their treasure in a cave, opened with the password "open sesame."
